title: Cut Down on Those Move-In Costs with $199 Security Deposit!!
posting_body: ['Harbor Crest is lakeside living at its best!', 'This beautiful apartment community in Euclid is the place to be.', 'Wake up to spectacular views of gorgeous sunrises and say good night to brilliant sunsets over Lake Erie.', 'Along with an amazing list of community amenities, we also offer the added convenience of online rental payment and maintenance requests.', 'Visit Harbor Crest at and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for!', 'Community Amenities', '•\tBrand New State-of-the- Art Fitness Center', '•\tSparkling Outdoor Pool', '•\tHeated Indoor Pool', '•\tTwo Party Rooms', '•\tAll New Common Area Upgrades Including Carpeting and Lighting', '•\tLaundry Facility in Each Building', '•\tCustomer Service Office Offering Package Acceptance, Fax and Copy Machines', '•\tUnderground Garage Parking Available', '•\tNear Public Transportation', '•\tEasy Access to Local Freeways', '•\tOn-Site Management', '•\tOn-Site Maintenance', '•\tControlled Building Access', '•\t24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '•\tOnline Rental Payments and Maintenance Requests', '•\tPreferred Employer Program and Senior Discount Available', 'Large one bedroom with 2 closets in the bedroom!', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats - 2 allowed, Rent $20.00, Deposit $300.00', '•\tComments:', 'Rent is per cat.', 'Deposit is non-refundable.', 'Must be spayed or neutered.', 'It only takes 2 minutes!', 'Go to <URL> to see what Harbor Crest has to offer, please call', 'show contact info', 'today if you have any questions or to schedule an appointment.']
